Omegasis.HappyBirthday_BelatedBirthdayWi: Happy belated birthday, @! ^^Sorry I missed you, but I got you something! Enjoy your present!^^ - Claire {0}
Belated happy birthday, adventurer. ^^I apologize for being hard to track down, but I'm sure you know how the busy life is, too. ^^This is for you. I know you will make good use of it. ^^ - Lance {0}
Belated happy birthday, @. ^^This is for you. Be well in the coming year. ^^ - Magnus Rasmodius {0}

Belated happy birthday, @! ^^The other ladies told me it was your birthday yesterday, so I wanted to get something for you! I do hope you know how beloved you are here in Pelican Town! ^^Take care, dear. ^^ - Olivia {0}

Happy belated birthday, @! ^^I heard it was yesterday! Sorry I couldn't see you in person, had a pretty busy week on the vineyard. I included a little present from me with this letter, though. ^^Hope you like it! ^^ - Sophia {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^^Hope you had a great year! This is for you, see you around! ^^ - Victor {0}

Belated happy birthday, farmer. ^^Heard at Gus's that it was yesterday. You're taking good care of that farm, makes me happy to see it going to good use after all this time. ^^Here's a gift from me to help you out over there. Don't be a stranger. ^^ - Andy {0}

Belated happy birthday, Mr. @.Â¦Belated happy birthday, Ms. @. ^^Your contributions to our community are making Pelican Town a better place. Make sure you're taking care of yourself, too. ^^Please accept this gift. I and many others greatly appreciate your presence here. ^^ - Gunther {0}

Good day, @. Belated happy birthday to you. ^^I realize the Guild is far out of the way of %farm Farm. You are always welcome, though. You do well in helping us to protect the valley, and we all want you to know it. ^^Attached is a gift, from Gil and I. Safe spelunking, @. ^^ - Marlon {0}
Hey, @! Happy belated birthday! ^^Work was crazy yesterday, so I ended up missing you, but I got you something! ^^ - Martin {0}
Yesterday was your birthday? Happy Birthday. ^^ - Morgan {0}
@, belated happy birthday. ^^From us on the team at Joja Co., I present you with this gift. ^^ - Morris {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^^Sophia told me and I thought I should get you something! Enjoy! ^^ - Scarlett {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^^Here's to another year, neighbor! Please let me know how you like my present, I hope it helps you out over there! ^^ - Susan {0}
